title: Dell Technologies | Software Engineer 1 | Bangalore
content:
Education: Btech Computer Science (Tier 2 College)
Years of Experience: 6 months
Prior Experience: Remote internship in a startup 
Date of the Offer: August 2024 (On-Campus)
Company: Dell Technologies
Title/Level: Software Engineer I
Location: Bangalore
Internship Stipend : ₹40,000
Salary: ₹11,50,000
Relocation: NA
Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: Variable Component : ₹85,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ ₹12,35,000
Benefits: Standard Dell benefits -> Wifi, Medical Insurance, Food, Paid Leaves, 2-3 day offline office visits per week etc

title: Salesforce | PayPal | 10 Years Experienced
content:
Education: BTech IT
Years of Experience: 10.6
Title: Lead Engineer
Prior Experience: Product based company (Chennai)
Previous Compensation -> 34 Base + 6 Variable = 40 LPA


Company : PayPal
Title/Level: MTS-1 (T25 level)
Location: Chennai
Base Salary: 45 LPA (Inc. PF)
Bonus: 10% of base
Stock bonus: 57000 USD -> Divided in 3 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 45L + 4.5L + 16L ~ 65.5 LPA for 1st year
Other details: Hybrid


Company : Salesforce
Title/Level: SMTS
Location: Hyderabad
Base Salary: 55 LPA (Inc. PF)
Relocation Bonus: 1.5L
Joining Bonus: 3L
Stock bonus: 74K USD -> Divided in 4 years.
Bonus: 15% of base salary -> 8.25L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 55 + 8.25 + 16L ~ 79.25 LPA (First year)
Other details: Hybrid


Wanted to know which would be a better offer in terms of work life balance and growth. Felt salesforce offered role is a lower one for my level of experience but better in terms of compensation.


Will also share a separate post on the interview experiences as a whole.

title: Eightfold AI senior software engineer
content:
Education: B.Tech Old IIT
Years of Experience: 2.5
Date of the Offer: Jan 2025
Company: Eightold.ai
Title/Level: Senior Engineer
Location: Bengaluru/Noida
Prev Salary: ~35L (including bonus)
Salary: 40L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 5L
Stock bonus: ESOPS
Bonus: 15% = 6L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 51L + ESOPS
Benefits: insurance + food + wifi

title: HiLabs | Senior SDE | Bengaluru
content:
Education: Tier 1, IIT CSE
Years of Experience: 2.6
Prior Experience: A top product based company
Previous TC: 51L (24L Base + 27L RSUs yearly)
Date of the Offer: 25th Jan 2024
Company: HiLabs
Title/Level: Senior Software Development Engineer
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 35L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 2L
Stock bonus: 1000 ESOPS
Bonus: 7L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 44L + ESOPs
Benefits: Standard Benefits

Other detais:
Offer seems like a lowball compared to current compensation, waiting for other interviews lined up. Also heard HiLabs is a extremly toxic company. 

Let me know what you think.

title: KPMG | Java Developer Consultant I Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech from Tier-3
Years of Experience: 3
Date of the Offer: Nov 2024
Company: KPMG
Title/Level: Consultant
Location: Bangalore, India
Salary: 12.5LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 1Lakh
Stock bonus: Nil
Performance Bonus: 1.7lakh-3.4Lakh
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): Avg 15.2, Max 16.9
Benefits: Standard benefits
Previous CTC = 10.5LPA(All Fixed)
Offers in-hand: None
Verdict: Offer Rejected
